dayPrice.description: DayPrice is the price per day (VAT included)

hourPrice.description: HourPrice is the price per hour (VAT included)

kmPrice.description: KmPrice is the price per kilometer (VAT included)

clientContractId.description: if not present, creates new ClientContract. if present, attaches vehicle contract to existing ClientContract

vehicleId.description: If ClientContractID is not present, these 3 fields are required

dayPrice.description: DayPrice is the optional price per day for the vehicle model (VAT included). If not included, the day price will be calculated based on the hour price.

hourPrice.description: HourPrice is the price per hour for the vehicle model (VAT included).

kmPrice.description: KmPrice is the price per kilometer for the vehicle model (VAT included).

overrideDefaultPeriod.description: OverrideDefaultPeriod is a flag to indicate if the default period in the database (which has no valid_until entry) should be overridden by this entry.
OverrideDefaultPeriod is a flag to indicate if the default period in the database (which has no valid_until entry) should be overridden by this entry.

post.description: If successful, the booking for the user will be created.
If successful, the vehicle will be created.

put.description: If successful, the vehicle details will be updated.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all clients. Can be filtered using the 'name' query parameter for a LIKE search.
get.summary: Get all clients, optionally filtered by name

get.description: Get a client by ID, including users and their roles

put.description: Update a client, suspend. When unsuspending, sets reason to null

delete.description: Delete a user from a client as an admin
delete.summary: Delete a user from a client (admin)

put.description: Add a user to a client as an admin
put.summary: Add a user to a client (admin)

get.description: Get vehicles and groups for a client based on the client's contract and a time

parameters.description: Date in RFC3339 format (default: current date)
parameters.name: date

parameters.description: User ID (optional, to check if the user is a MainUser of the client)
parameters.name: userId

get.summary: Get vehicles and groups for a client

get.description: Get invoices for a client of which the user is a main user
Get invoice pdf for a client of which the user is a main user

get.summary: Determines the price rates and billing details based on the booking parameters (vehicle, period)

get.description: Gets all rates if no model IDs are specified. All rates, including past rates, are returned. Per model, the rates are ordered by valid_from in descending order.

parameters.description: Vehicle model IDs, separated by commas
parameters.name: models

get.summary: Get the rates for vehicle models

post.description: For convenience, multiple models can be specified for which the same rates hold.

delete.summary: Deletes a single vehicle model rate

get.description: Gets all rates if no vehicle IDs are specified. All rates, including past rates, are returned. Per vehicle, the rates are ordered by valid_from in descending order.

post.description: For convenience, multiple vehicles can be specified for which the same rates hold.

post.summary: Create a new client (company with VAT nr. or private person)

get.summary: Get information about a client you are the MainUser of

delete.description: Delete a user from a client
delete.summary: Delete a user from a client

put.description: Add a user to a client as a Mainuser of a client
put.summary: Add a user to a client

get.description: Get an uploaded document from the user
get.summary: Get an uploaded document from the user

post.description: Requests a password reset email to be sent
post.summary: Requests a password reset email to be sent

get.summary: Get the onboarding status of your own user
